titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation requiring the members of both Houses of Parliament to give their attendance upon the fifteenth day of February next
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twentieth day of December, in the eight and twentieth year of our reign, 1676.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
